item.title: AFRM
item.description: score:-37 Chances: Affirm shares soar on higher-than-expected forecast as delinquencies decline. Affirm’s strong performance is attributed to growth in customer transaction volumes. Affirm is well-positioned to harness changes in consumer behavior, according to the CFO. Affirm’s stock pops following analyst note on Debit+ card, indicating market optimism.
